title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 57-1.3 - Term of approval as a provider
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 57-1.3 - Term of approval as a provider

State Regulations
(a) Providers shall be approved for a period
of two years, except that a provider's approved status may be terminated during
such period in accordance with section
57-1.5
of this Subpart. (b) At the expiration of said term, the
provider may reapply to the department for approval following the procedures
indicated in section
57-1.2
of this Subpart. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
§§
57-1.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
